text: Jorge Romo Fuentes (20 April 1923 â€“ 17 June 2014) was a Mexican football midfielder. He played for Mexico in the 1954 and 1958 FIFA World Cups. He also played for Club Deportivo Marte and Deportivo Toluca. Romo died in Mexico City from natural causes, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== *FIFA profile *Jorge Romo's profile at worldfootball.net Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Mexican footballers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
